alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, Pierce, Atkinson, northwestern Ware, southeastern Bacon, southern Wayne, northwestern Clinch and southeastern Appling Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jesup to 8 miles south of Willacoochee. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Blackshear, Pearson, Patterson, Gardi, Screven, Offerman, Pebble Hill, Jamestown and Bristol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
